/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. A car can be seen in the distance, adding a touch of life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The image is taken from a low angle, making the trees appear tall and majestic against the sky. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of nature and urban life.
